title: Rabbit Stew (19P31)
text:
Set:	Ages End
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Bearer must be a [Shire] companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may transfer this condition to a fellowship companion. Each time this condition is transferred to a companion, heal that companion.
Rarity:	P
